glsa.title: Postfix: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been found in Postfix, the worst of which possibly allowing remote code execution.

background.p: Postfix is Wietse Venemaâ€™s mailer that attempts to be fast, easy to administer, and secure, as an alternative to the widely-used Sendmail program.

description.p: A vulnerability have been discovered in Postfix. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.

impact.p: An attacker could perform a man-in-the-middle attack and inject SMTP commands during the plaintext to TLS session switch or might execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Postfix users should upgrade to the latest version:
